member.name: IPropertyDescriptionList.GetAt
member.summary: Gets the property description at the specified index in a property description list.
member.param: The number of the property in the list string.
A reference to the IID of the requested property description interface, typically IID_IPropertyDescription.
When this method returns, contains the interface pointer requested in riid. Typically, this is .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyDescriptionList.GetCount
member.summary: Gets the number of properties included in the property list.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the count of properties.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyDescriptionList
member.summary: Exposes methods that extract information from a collection of property descriptions presented as a list.
